1.title: to do list
1.description: This is a simple to do list, where you can add, edit and delete tasks.

todolists.technologies: This development is based on a simple array, validating both the form and the button with Reactive Forms and use of the keyup event (enter)
todolists.description:
Simple todolist, we can add tasks by typing in the input and pressing the add task button or pressing the enter key. 
To delete a task just press the cross button.
